Articles.Content:
Eh up folks,

I've got three mods installed onto my KSP game but the logos are just showing up as white or grey squares like a place holder texture...

the mods I've got are: Kerbal Engineer Redux, Kerbal Alarm Clock and For Science

anyone know whats going on or is it just me with the issue?

cheers

On 7/19/2016 at 5:26 AM, jammyman21 said:

Eh up folks,

I've got three mods installed onto my KSP game but the logos are just showing up as white or grey squares like a place holder texture...

the mods I've got are: Kerbal Engineer Redux, Kerbal Alarm Clock and For Science

anyone know whats going on or is it just me with the issue?

cheers

did you convert the textures or move them? they need to be png's probably and in specfic folders.

No I don't think I did... I'll have a look later 

Thanks for the hand

On 7/19/2016 at 0:26 PM, jammyman21 said:

Eh up folks,

I've got three mods installed onto my KSP game but the logos are just showing up as white or grey squares like a place holder texture...

the mods I've got are: Kerbal Engineer Redux, Kerbal Alarm Clock and For Science

anyone know whats going on or is it just me with the issue?

cheers

Looks like you installed them improperly. Such issues are usually caused by wrong installation. Did you use CKAN? If not, what exactly did you do to install them?
I got them off Curse and extracted them to the plugins bit in the game files

On 7/21/2016 at 5:29 PM, jammyman21 said:

I got them off Curse and extracted them to the plugins bit in the game files

 

So you did it wrong. Do it as you are told to in either their forum threads, or their readme files.
as TheDestroyer111 said. You have installed the mods into the wrong directory. The mods in question cannot find their Icon files as theya re not in the correct folders.
